ProductInfo.Features:
PKD-DK40107-500GB kit includes a H.264 standalone DVR and four indoor security cameras, which is perfect for the security of your home or small business.
The DVR-H9124V is a 4 channel, fully integrated, real time, and hardware based standalone digital video recorder. Network access, VGA video output, and USB2.0 backup, this DVR is perfect for the home or small business.
This standalone DVR is based on an embedded Linux operating system and includes a remote control for easy setup and operation.
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo 4 Channel H.264 DVR with 500GB HDD + 4 x 480TVL CMOS Outdoor Bullet Camera Weatherproof Surviellance Kit PKD-DK40107-500GB
